what: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
title: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
text: function returns patient's pre-test Probability (PTP) obstructive coronary artery disease (CAD) based European Society Cardiology (ESC) 2019 guidelines.

title: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
code: calculate_esc_2019_ptp(   age,   sex = c(0, 1),   dyspnea_only = c(0, 1),   chest_pain = c(0, 1, 2, 3),   output = c("grouping", "numeric", "percentage") )

title: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
text: age Input integer indicate age patient. sex Input integer 0 1 indicate sex patient. Default: 0 0 stands Female 1 stands Male dyspnea_only Input integer 0 1 indicate patient dyspnea symptoms. Default: 0 0 stands dyspnea-symptoms. patient   chest pain symptoms, value also set 0 regardless   patient dyspnea . 1 stands dyspnea primary symptom. chest_pain Input integer 0 3 indicate chest pain characteristics patient. Default: 0 0 stands patient chest pain. 1 stands patient typical chest pain. 2 stands patient atypical chest pain. 3 stands patient non-anginal chest pain. output Input text indicate pre-test probability results expressed Default: c("grouping", "numeric", "percentage") grouping means PTP expressed Low, Intermediate High. Low PTP less 5 Intermediate PTP 5 High PTP 15 numeric means PTP expressed integer probability (0-100). percentage means PTP expressed percentage text (0-100%).

title: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
text: integer category representing patient's PTP obstructive CAD based ESC 2019 guidelines. See parameter option `output` information.

title: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
text: predictive model used create guidelines based patients European countries low cardiovascular disease (CVD) risk. ESC 2019 PTP CAD table follows: ESC 2019 pre-test probabilities obstructive coronary artery disease (CAD) table taken Juhani Knuuti et. al. SpringerLink licensed CC 4.0.

title: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
code: # 30 female with typical chest pain calculate_esc_2019_ptp(     age = 35,     sex = 0,     dyspnea_only = 0,     chest_pain = 1,     output = "percentage" ) #> [1] "5%"  # 75 male with only dyspnea calculate_esc_2019_ptp(     age = 75,     sex = 0,     dyspnea_only = 1,     chest_pain = 0,     output = "percentage" ) #> [1] "12%"

title: Round To Nearest Digit — round_to_nearest_digit
text: number Input numeric value digits Input integer indicating number decimal places used. default, rounds nearest integer. Default: 0
